document.full_text: more than 40 militiamen and two soldiers died when rebel militias raided the capital of south sudan's oil-producing upper nile state and took more than 100 children hostage in an orphanage, the southern army said.
document.title: more than 42 fighters dead in raid on s.sudan town
lines_and_colors: more than 40 militiamen and two soldiers died when rebel militias raided the capital of south sudan's oil-producing upper nile state and took more than 100 children hostage in an orphanage, the southern army said.
